topic.title: How efficient is Zeronet at transferring large files that I want to use to store files...
topic.body: In fact, I want to use it to store my documents, including some notes (certainly not private things).

1553761593_1MjsL5PfMMc5ooZTq1zUKd5uaA93q.body: all right, It seems that I have to use Evernote.

all right, It seems that I have to use Evernote.
